inclusion.criterion: histologically proven supratentorial anaplastic oligodendrogliomas, anaplastic mixed oligoastrocytomas anaplastic astrocytomas or glioblastoma multiforme
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: unequivocal evidence for tumor recurrence or progression by MRI scan performed within 14 days prior to enrollment or documented recurrence by tumor resection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: equal to or greater than 12 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status of equal to or greater than 60
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recovered from the toxic effects of prior therapy: 4 weeks from prior cytotoxic therapy and/or at least two weeks from vincristine, 6 weeks from nitrosoureas, 3 weeks from procarbazine administration, and 1 week for non-cytotoxic agents
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate bone marrow function (ANC equal or greater than 1,500/mm^3 and platelet count of equal or greater than 100,000/mm^3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate liver function (SGPT and alkaline phosphatase <2 times normal, bilirubin <1.5 mg%)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate renal function (BUN and creatinine <1.5 times institutional normal)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all patients must sign an informed consent indicating that they are aware of the investigational nature of this study in keeping with the policies of this hospital
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The baseline on-study MRI is performed within 14 days of enrollment and on a steroid dosage that has been stable.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of any other cancer (except non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in-situ of the cervix), unless in complete remission and off of all therapy for that disease for a minimum of 3 years
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients of childbearing potential must not be pregnant or become pregnant.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients must not have: active infection; disease that will obscure toxicity or dangerously alter drug metabolism; serious intercurrent medical illness
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter, high-dose steroids, hypertension, and chronic pain. The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation.
